original_text: I hope that my work among you Gentiles will cause my own people to be jealous. As a result, some of them may turn to God, so that he saves them. I hope that my work among you Gentiles will cause my own people to be jealous. As a result, some of them may turn to God, so that he saves them.
korean_text: 이는 혹 내 골육을 아무쪼록 시기하게 하여 그들 중에서 얼마를 구원하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: I hope that my work among you Gentiles
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내가 너희 이방인들 중에서 하는 일이

sentences.original_text: will cause my own people to be jealous.
As a result, some of them may turn to God,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 그들 중 일부가 하나님께 돌아올 수 있고,
그래서 그가 그들을 구원하게 하려는 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I hope that my work among you Gentiles

sentences.original_text: will cause my own people to be jealous.
As a result, some of them may turn to God,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 그들 중 일부가 하나님께 돌아올 수 있고,
